channel.title: Gear on Justin Napolitano
channel.description: Recent content in Gear on Justin Napolitano

item.title: Curate an EDC Pouch
item.description: Why i have a bunch of random tools and pouches laying about. I don’t like it. So to feel better i want to organize a pouch that i can throw into any of my bags so that i can deal with most things i face in day to day to life. Guiding principles I want tools that reduce the friction in my average day to day dealings I want the pouch to be small enough to fit inside all of my bags I want the tool set to be modular so that it can be used as the base of other kits.
